DOC.brief_summary: This is an open-label, long term compassionate use study of 125 mg per day of azimilide 2HCl in a patient who completed two other protocols (2000098 and 2001060.
DOC.brief_title: Compassionate Use Study of 125 mg Per Day of Azimilide Dihydrochloride in One Patient
DOC.criteria: No inclusion criteria as the patient to be included is this compassionate use protocol is currently receiving azimilide therapy Currently taking Class I or other Class III antiarrhythmic drug or other drugs that may prolong QT interval. Is unwilling or unable to give or understand informed consent.
